gr.fire.util
Class Log

java.lang.Object
  gr.fire.util.Log

public final class Log
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class for easily logging on fire application. It writes the messages sent to it using the Log.logInfo, Log.logWarn, Log.logError and Log.logDebug methods to one or more predefined Loggers. The default logger is standard output. The developer can add more loggers or set a different (remove standard out) logger.

Author:
padeler
See Also:
setLogDestination(Logger), addLogDestination(Logger), Logger

Field Detail

showDebug

public static boolean showDebug
Flag to enable or disable debuging information. If false the calls to Log.logDebug will not produce any output.

Method Detail

setLogDestination

public static void setLogDestination(Logger l)
Sets the only logger to be the given.

Parameters:
l - the new logger. All previous loggers are removed.

addLogDestination

public static void addLogDestination(Logger o)
Adds the given logger to the loggers list. All loggers will receive the output.

Removes the given logger from the loggers list.

o -
